faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TRAVI World
faq.whatIsTraviAnswer: TRAVI World is a comprehensive travel information platform covering 17 destinations worldwide with detailed guides for 3,000+ attractions, hotels, restaurants, and activities.
faq.howManyDestinations: How many destinations does TRAVI cover?
faq.howManyDestinationsAnswer: TRAVI World covers 17 major travel destinations including Dubai, Paris, Tokyo, New York, Barcelona, Singapore, London, Bangkok, Abu Dhabi, Amsterdam, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, and Rome.
faq.isFree: Is TRAVI World free to use?
faq.isFreeAnswer: Yes, TRAVI World is completely free to use. Browse thousands of travel guides, attraction reviews, hotel recommendations, and restaurant suggestions at no cost.
faq.updateFrequencyAnswer: TRAVI World content is updated daily with the latest travel news, new attraction reviews, and updated information about hotels and restaurants across all 17 destinations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TRAVI destination guides
faq.q1: How many destinations does TRAVI cover?
faq.a1: TRAVI covers major travel destinations across the Middle East, Europe, Asia, and Americas with comprehensive guides for each location.
faq.q2: What information is included in TRAVI destination guides?
faq.a2: Each destination guide includes detailed descriptions covering attractions, accommodation options, local cuisine, transportation tips, and practical travel information.
faq.a3: Yes, TRAVI allows searching destinations by name or country using the search bar on the destinations page.
faq.q4: What are the featured destinations on TRAVI?
faq.a4: TRAVI's featured destinations are handpicked locations offering exceptional experiences for travelers with diverse interests from luxury to budget travel.
